page.title: 03 Burnhope Mast-cont.
page.content: {Burnhope Mast Maintenance men are responsible for maintaining all the transmitters in the North East, including Pontop Pike.A computer in Huddersfield watches over Burnhope mast. There are two electricity cables from Annfield Plain and Durham in case there is a power cut in one area.The electricity bill is Â£2,000 per month. They are other aerial uses on the mast.The doctor has an aerial on the mast because he carries a bleeper in his pocket so the nurse can tell him when to go to patients.R. and A. Young,a haulage contractor,need an aerial on the mast because they have a fleet of lorries so the managers can speak to all the workers.The mast is going to be continued to be a radio station.
